Package uni.climatemonitor.common

Interface IDatabaseService

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface IDatabaseService extends Remote
This interface exposes services to query the DB

    • pushMonitoringCenter

      String pushMonitoringCenter(MonitoringCenter c, ArrayList<String> monitoredAreas) throws RemoteException
      Push a new monitoring center to the MonitoringCenter table and the corresponding monitored areas in the Monitors table. Since the monitoring center id is unknown, it is computed and returned by this method to the caller.
      Parameters:
      c - the monitoring center
      monitoredAreas - its monitored areas
      Returns:
      the id of the new monitoring center
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • isMonitoringCentersTableEmpty

      boolean isMonitoringCentersTableEmpty() throws RemoteException
      Check if the MonitoringCenter table is empty
      Returns:
      true if it's empty
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • getAllMonitoringCenters

      ArrayList<MonitoringCenter> getAllMonitoringCenters() throws RemoteException
      Get the list of all existing monitoring centers
      Returns:
      the list of all monitoring centers
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • addLocationToMonitoringCenter

      boolean addLocationToMonitoringCenter(Location l, MonitoringCenter mc) throws RemoteException
      Update the Monitors table such that the given location is now monitored by the given monitoring center
      Parameters:
      l - the location
      mc - the monitoring center
      Returns:
      true if success
      Throws:
      RemoteException
